title: How to write right to left text in HTML - Quora

response.answer_text:
The HTML DIR attribute specifies the base direction (LTR, RTL) of text, or sections of text. Setting up a right to left page Add dir="rtl" to the html tag any time the overall document direction is right-to-left. This sets the base direction for the whole document. No dir attribute is needed for documents that have a base direction of left-to-right, since this is the default.     ... To write a paragraph with a right-to-left direction:
